imarine business model
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/H.3.7 Digital Libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An activity to define the mission statement of the initiative, assess the type of business model centred on a public partnership, propose a business plan for sustaining the iMarine baseline activities, and prepare the ground for a business plan under a growth scenario
